columns.book_club_id: The unique identifier for each book club entry.
columns.Year: The publication year of the book.
columns.Author_or_Editor: The name of the book's author or editor.
columns.Book_Title: The title of the book listed in the book club.
columns.Publisher: The name of the publisher of the book.
columns.Category: The genre or category of the book.
columns.Result: The award result associated with the book.

book_club.table_description: The table catalogs book club entries with publication details.

columns.movie_id: The unique identifier for each movie entry.
columns.Title: The name of the movie as presented.
columns.Year: The year the movie was released.
columns.Director: The name of the director of the movie.
columns.Budget_million: The production budget of the movie in millions.
columns.Gross_worldwide: The total worldwide gross revenue of the movie.

movie.table_description: The table records details about various movies produced.

columns.Company_name: The unique name of the culture company.
columns.Type: The operational type of the culture company.
columns.Incorporated_in: The location where the company was incorporated.
columns.Group_Equity_Shareholding: The percentage of equity shareholding in the group.
columns.book_club_id: The identifier for the associated book club.
columns.movie_id: The identifier for the associated movie.

culture_company.table_description: The table tracks culture companies and their affiliations.
